questions: How to use Mailchimp MA with Tracardi?
What is the extension needed to use Mailchimp MA with Tracardi?
How to install the extension to use Mailchimp MA with Tracardi?
answer:
# Can Tracardi use Mailchimp MA, a marketing automation platform and email marketing service?
Yes. To use Mailchimp MA, install the extension Mailchimp MA in Resource/Extensions.
